title: Billy Gets Lost
description: Billy and Emmy are playing catch when suddenly Cat runs by. Billy chases after Cat. When Cat runs up a tree, Billy realizes he is lost. How will Billy ever get home? Perhaps some other animals will help him. Students are provided with the opportunity to identify cause-and-effect relationships. Readers are supported by illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases throughout the book.
meta: chases, farm, fetch, field, house, street
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand the story and remember information
Cause and Effect : Understand and identify cause-and-effect relationships
Short Vowels : Identify words with short /a/ vowel
Verb Tense : Identify and use present-tense verbs
Position Words : Identify and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
